titleStmt.title: The Scotch clergies protestation & appeal given in at Aberdein. In 1694. Under form of instrument to the committee of the late general-assembly, by the ministers delegate for that end, from the diocesses of Aberdein, for themselves and in the name of all their adherents. Licensed according to order.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Richard Smith in Thames-street, near Baynard's-Castle,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
